meta.description: Optimize the selection of feed types to meet nutritional requirements at minimum cost.

params.name: protein_content
params.description: Protein content per gram of each feed.

params.name: mineral_content
params.description: Mineral content per gram of each feed.

params.name: vitamin_content
params.description: Vitamin content per milligram of each feed.

params.name: price
params.description: Price per kilogram of each feed.

vars.name: amount
vars.description: Amount of each feed type to use in grams.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(amount[f] * price[f] / 1000 for f in FEEDS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of feed selection.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(amount[f] * protein_content[f] for f in FEEDS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 700g of protein is provided.

constraints.name: mineral_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(amount[f] * mineral_content[f] for f in FEEDS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 30g of minerals is provided.

constraints.name: vitamin_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(amount[f] * vitamin_content[f] for f in FEEDS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 100mg of vitamins is provided.
